description.english: Win the first stage with 3 stars.
description.italian: Win the first stage with 3 stars.
description.japanese: 最初のステージで3つ星を獲得する。
description.portuguese: Vença a fase 1 com 3 estrelas.
description.schinese: 首次在某一关中拿到3颗星。
description.spanish: Supera el nivel 1 con 3 estrellas.

description.english: Help baldo sneak into the mountain.
description.german: Hilf baldo, in den Berg zu kommen.
description.italian: Help baldo sneak into the mountain.
description.japanese: ビルボが山へ入る手助けをする。
description.koreana: 빌보가 산에 숨어들어갈 수 있게 도우십시오.
description.portuguese: Ajude baldo a entrar na montanha.
description.spanish: Ayuda a baldo a entrar en la montaña.

description.japanese: アルマジロを全て見つける。
description.portuguese: Encontrar todos os tatus
description.spanish: Encuentra a todos los armadillos

description.english: Destroy 3 mine carts before they reach their destination.
description.italian: Destroy 3 mine carts before they reach their destination.
description.japanese: 3台の鉱山トロッコを、目的地にたどり着く前に破壊する。
description.koreana: 광산 수레 3개가 목적지에 닿기 전에 파괴하십시오.
description.portuguese: Destrua 3 carros de minas.
description.schinese: 毁掉3辆矿车，阻止它们抵达目的地。
description.spanish: Destruye 3 carretillas.
description.tchinese: 摧毀3輛礦車，阻止其到目的地。

displayName.japanese: 鉱山トロッコ大立ち回り

description.french: Aide Donkey Kong dans les mines.
description.japanese: 鉱山にてDKを助ける。
description.portuguese: Ajude DK a atravessar as minas.
description.schinese: 帮助矮人王国穿越矿区。
description.spanish: Ayuda a Donkey Kong en las minas.

description.english: Get rid of those annoying pests and whack 5 Moles.
description.italian: Get rid of those annoying pests and whack 5 Moles.
description.japanese: 煩わしい害獣モグラを5匹やっつける。
description.portuguese: Acerte 5 toupeiras.
description.schinese: 摆脱那些烦人的臭虫，重击5只鼹鼠。
description.spanish: Golpea a 5 topos.
description.tchinese: 擺脫那些討厭的蟲子，打5個地鼠。

description.japanese: 敵を500体倒す。
description.portuguese: Mate 500 inimigos.
description.spanish: Mata a 500 enemigos.

description.japanese: ボーニーを眠りにつかせる。
description.portuguese: Ponha o Borney para dormir.
description.spanish: Consigue que Borney se duerma.

displayName.japanese: アイル ビー バック

description.japanese: T-800を溶かす。
description.portuguese: Derrete o T-800.
description.spanish: Funde el T-800.

description.english: Take the ring back from Bollum before it's too late.
description.german: Hol den Ring von Bollum zurück.
description.italian: Take the ring back from Bollum before it's too late.
description.japanese: 手遅れになる前にゴラムから指輪を取り戻す。
description.portuguese: Tome o anel de Bollum.
description.schinese: 把戒指带回哥伦姆，以免为时已晚。
description.spanish: Quítale el anillo a Bollum.
description.tchinese: 趁早從咕嚕手裡把魔戒拿回來。

displayName.portuguese: Viva o verde ou vá embora

description.japanese: タワーを20本売却する。

description.spanish: Vende 20 torres.

description.japanese: タワーをを100本建造する。
description.portuguese: Construa 80 torres.
description.spanish: Construye 80 torres.

description.japanese: 敵部隊を15回早く呼び込む。

description.spanish: Adelanta 15 oleadas enemigas.

description.japanese: チョンプボットを80体倒す。
description.portuguese: Destrua 80 Robôs Chomp.

description.english: Kill 13 Engineers before they can repair a Machine.
description.italian: Kill 13 Engineers before they can repair a Machine.

description.portuguese: Mate 13 engenheiros.
description.schinese: 杀死13名工程师，不要让他们有机会修好哪怕一台机器。
description.spanish: Mata a 13 ingenieros.
description.tchinese: 消滅13個工程師，不讓他們修理機器。

description.english: Great Scott! Burn 88 Presto logs and reach maximum speed!

description.portuguese: Vença Polyx, o sábio
description.spanish: Derrota a Polyx el Sabio

description.japanese: 最初のアベンジャーを見つける。
description.portuguese: Encontre o primeiro vingador.
description.spanish: Encuentra al Primer Vengador.

description.english: Find out why the dog is barking.
description.german: Finde heraus, warum der Hund bellt.
description.italian: Find out why the dog is barking.
description.japanese: なぜ犬が吠えているのか解明する。
description.portuguese: Descubra por que o cão está latindo.
description.spanish: Descubre por qué el perro está ladrando.

description.english: Help the yeti have a decent meal.
description.french: Aide le yéti à faire un bon repas
description.german: Hilf dem Yeti, eine anständige Mahlzeit zu bekommen.
description.italian: Help the yeti have a decent meal.
description.japanese: イエティがまとまな食事にありつくのを手伝う。
description.portuguese: Ajude o Yeti a ter uma refeição decente.
description.spanish: Ayuda al yeti a conseguir una comida decente.

description.english: Defeat the Winter Queen of the Frozen North.
description.french: Bats la Reine du Givre du Nord gelé.
description.german: Besiege die Winterkönigin des Eisigen Nordens.
description.italian: Defeat the Winter Queen of the Frozen North.
description.japanese: 北の大地の冬の女王を倒す。
description.portuguese: Derrote a rainha do inverno do Norte congelado.
description.russian: Победите Королеву Зимы с Замерзшего Севера.
description.schinese: 击败冰冻北国的凛冬女王。
description.spanish: Derrota a la Reina del Invierno del Norte Helado.
description.tchinese: 打敗來自冰封北方的冬日女王。

description.english: Find Slenderman, the old-fashioned horror creature.
description.french: Trouvez Slenderman, la célèbre créature de l’horreur.
description.italian: Find Slenderman, the old-fashioned horror creature.
description.japanese: 古き良き時代のホラークリーチャー、スレンダーマンを見つける
description.koreana: 한물 갔지만 공포스러운 존재, 슬렌더맨을 찾으세요.
description.portuguese: Encontre Slenderman, a velha criatura terrível.
description.russian: Найдите Слендермена, существо из древних страшилок.
description.schinese: 找到经典老片风格的恐怖生物“瘦长鬼影”。
description.spanish: Encuentra a Slenderman, la criatura de horror pasada de moda.
description.tchinese: 找到古老的恐怖生物，瘦長鬼影。

description.english: Sink the girl in the Black Lagoon.
description.french: Faites couler la fille dans le lac noir.
description.german: Versenke das Mädchen in der Schwarzen Lagune.
description.italian: Sink the girl in the Black Lagoon.
description.japanese: ブラックラグーン（黒い沼）に少女を沈める
description.portuguese: Afogue a garota na Lagoa sombria.
description.spanish: Hunde a la chica en la Laguna Negra.
description.tchinese: 把這個女孩沉入黑色瀉湖。

description.english: Collect the five pieces of Lord Blackburn's armor.
description.french: Rassemblez les cinq parties de l’armure du Seigneur Brûlenoir.
description.german: Sammle die fünf Teile von Fürst Blackburns Rüstung.
description.italian: Collect the five pieces of Lord Blackburn's armor.
description.japanese: ブラックバーン卿の鎧のパーツ5個を集める
description.koreana: 대군주 블랙번의 갑옷 다섯 부위를 모으세요.
description.portuguese: Colete as cinco peças da armadura de Lord Fogonegro.
description.russian: Соберите пять частей доспехов лорда Блэкберна.
description.schinese: 集齐魔王布莱克本的五件盔甲。
description.spanish: Reúne las cinco piezas de la armadura de Lord Blackburn.
description.tchinese: 收集5件魔王布雷克本護甲。

description.english: Become the White Lotus priest apprentice.
description.french: Deviens l’apprenti du prêtre Lotus Blanc.
description.italian: Become the White Lotus priest apprentice.
description.japanese: ホワイトロータス プリーストの弟子になる。
description.portuguese: Torne-se o aprendiz de sacerdote Lotus branco.
description.schinese: 成为白莲僧门下的学徒。
description.spanish: Conviértete en el aprendiz del sacerdote del Loto Blanco.

displayName.japanese: ハッピーニューイヤー！

description.japanese: 花火を全て打ち上げる
description.portuguese: Solte todos os fogos de artifício.
description.spanish: Dispara todos los fuegos artificiales.

description.japanese: ウォータードラゴンキングを倒す。
description.portuguese: Derrote o Rei Dragão de água.
description.spanish: Derrota al Rey Dragón del Agua.

displayName.japanese: 足元の卑怯者は掃討する！

description.english: Force the undermined to breath some fresh air.
description.french: Forcez les minés à respirer un peu d'air frais !
description.german: Zwinge die Unterdrückten dazu, etwas frische Luft zu atmen.
description.italian: Force the undermined to breath some fresh air.
description.japanese: 地下の者たちに新鮮な空気を吸わせる。
description.koreana: 약해진 자들에게 강제로 신선한 공기를들이마시게 합니다.
description.portuguese: Force os fracos a respirar um pouco de ar fresco.
description.russian: Пусть подземные существа подышат свежим воздухом.
description.schinese: 迫使受破坏者呼吸新鲜空气。
description.spanish: Obliga a respirar algo de aire fresco a los que están bajo tierra.
description.tchinese: 迫使受破壞者呼吸新鮮空氣。

description.english: Poke the demogorgons out of their hiding.
description.french: Faites sortir les démogorgons de leur cachette.
description.german: Locke die Demogorgonen aus ihrem Versteck.
description.italian: Poke the demogorgons out of their hiding.
description.japanese: 隠れているデモゴルゴンをつつく。
description.portuguese: Atrai os demogorgons para fora da toca.
description.spanish: Obliga a los demogorgons a salir de su escondite.

displayName.japanese: この恐竜はなんていい子なんだ。

description.english: Find the hidden cute dino who likes bushes.
description.french: Trouvez l'adorable petit dinosaure qui apprécie les buissons.
description.german: Finde den versteckten süßen Dino, der Büsche mag.
description.italian: Find the hidden cute dino who likes bushes.
description.japanese: 隠れている、茂みが好きなかわいい恐竜を見つける。
description.koreana: 덤불을 좋아해서 숨어 있을귀여운 공룡을 찾아야 합니다.
description.portuguese: Encontre o dinossauro fofinho que gosta de arbustos.
description.russian: Найдите прячущегося динозаврика, который обожает кусты.
description.schinese: 找到喜欢小树丛的可爱恐龙。
description.spanish: Encuentra al adorable dinosaurio oculto al que le gustan los arbustos.
description.tchinese: 找到喜歡小樹叢的可愛恐龍。

displayName.french: Au sommet de la chaîne alimentaire.
displayName.japanese: 食物連鎖頂点の捕食者。

description.japanese: 獰猛なグレートTを倒す。
description.portuguese: Derrote o Grande-T feroz.
description.spanish: Derrota al feroz Gran-t.

description.english: Have the smith forge a cool helmet.
description.french: Fais forger un casque cool par le forgeron.
description.german: Lass den Schmied einen coolen Helm schmieden.
description.italian: Have the smith forge a cool helmet.
description.japanese: 鍛冶屋にかっこいいヘルメットを作らせろ。
description.portuguese: Faça o ferreiro forjar um capacete legal.
description.schinese: 让铁匠打造一个酷炫的头盔。
description.spanish: Haz que el herrero forje un casco muy atractivo.
description.tchinese: 讓鐵匠鑄造一個酷酷的頭盔。

description.english: Help the cute runner avoid the explosive trap.
description.french: Aide le coureur mignon à éviter le piège explosif.
description.german: Hilf dem süßen Läufer, der explosiven Falle auszuweichen.
description.italian: Help the cute runner avoid the explosive trap.
description.japanese: かわいいランナーが爆発的な罠を避けるのを助ける。
description.koreana: 귀여운 주자가 폭발하는 함정을 피하도록 도와주세요.
description.portuguese: Ajude o corredor simpático a evitar a armadilha explosiva.
description.russian: Помогите милому бегуну избежать взрывной ловушки.
description.schinese: 帮助可爱的跑者避开爆炸陷阱。
description.spanish: Ayuda al adorable corredor a evitar la trampa explosiva.
description.tchinese: 幫助可愛的跑者避開爆炸陷阱。

displayName.portuguese: De Malas Prontas para Ver o Mundo!

description.english: Set the magic carpet free so it can fulfill its dreams.
description.french: Libère le tapis magique pour qu'il puisse réaliser ses rêves.
description.german: Lass den magischen Teppich frei, damit er seine Träume erfüllen kann.
description.italian: Set the magic carpet free so it can fulfill its dreams.
description.japanese: 魔法のカーペットを自由にして、その夢を叶えさせろ。
description.koreana: 마법의 카펫을 자유롭게 해서 그 꿈을 이룰 수 있게 하세요.
description.portuguese: Liberte o tapete mágico para que possa realizar seus sonhos.
description.russian: Отпустите волшебный ковёр, чтобы он мог исполнить свои мечты.
description.schinese: 释放魔法飞毯，让它实现梦想。
description.spanish: Libera la alfombra mágica para que pueda cumplir sus sueños.
description.tchinese: 讓魔毯自由以至於它能實現它的夢想。

description.english: Summon the mummies 13 times to fight for your cause.
description.french: Invoque les momies 13 fois pour combattre pour ta cause.
description.german: Beschwöre die Mumien 13 Mal, um für deine Sache zu kämpfen.
description.italian: Summon the mummies 13 times to fight for your cause.
description.japanese: お前のために13回ミイラを召喚する。
description.koreana: 당신의 대의을 위해 싸울 미라를 13번 소환하세요.
description.portuguese: Convoque as múmias 13 vezes para lutar pela sua causa.
description.russian: Призовите мумий 13 раз, чтобы они сражались за ваше дело.
description.schinese: 召唤木乃伊13次为你的事业而战。
description.spanish: Invoca 13 veces a las momias para luchar por tu causa.
description.tchinese: 召喚木乃伊13次為你的事業而戰。

displayName.japanese: ただ一つとして数える

description.japanese: 17の戦象を倒す。
description.portuguese: Derrote 17 Elefantes de Guerra.
description.spanish: Derrota a 17 Elefantes de Guerra.

description.english: Find the hidden shadow mage across the Hammerhold campaign.
description.french: Trouve le mage d'ombre caché à travers la campagne de Hammerhold.
description.german: Finde den versteckten Schattenmagier in der Hammerhold-Kampagne.
description.italian: Find the hidden shadow mage across the Hammerhold campaign.
description.japanese: ハマーホルドキャンペーン全体で隠された影の魔法使いを見つけろ。
description.koreana: 해머홀드 캠페인 전역에서 숨겨진 그림자 마법사를 찾으세요.
description.portuguese: Encontre o mago sombrio escondido através da campanha de Hammerhold.
description.russian: Найдите скрытого теневого мага во всей кампании Молотобержья.
description.schinese: 在哈默霍尔德战役中找到隐藏的暗影法师。
description.spanish: Encuentra al mago de las sombras oculto en toda la campaña de Martillaria.
description.tchinese: 在哈默霍德戰役中找到隱藏的影子法師。

description.english: Defeat the Hammerhold king to rule them all.
description.french: Vainquez le roi de Hammerhold pour régner sur tous.
description.german: Besiege den König von Hammerhold, um über alle zu herrschen.
description.italian: Defeat the Hammerhold king to rule them all.
description.japanese: ハマーホルドの王を倒して、すべてを支配しろ。
description.koreana: 해머홀드 왕을 패배시켜 그들 모두를 다스리세요.
description.portuguese: Derrote o rei de Hammerhold para governar todos eles.
description.russian: Победите короля Молотобержья, чтобы править всеми.
description.schinese: 击败哈默霍尔德国王，统治他们所有人。
description.spanish: Derrota al rey de Martillaria para gobernarlos a todos.
description.tchinese: 擊敗哈默霍德國王以統治他們所有人。

description.english: Lend a hand to the worried captain in search for the ticking crocodile.
description.french: Prêtez main-forte au capitaine inquiet à la recherche du crocodile qui fait tic-tac
description.german: Hilf dem besorgten Kapitän bei der Suche nach dem tickenden Krokodil
description.japanese: 心配する船長のために時計のようにカチカチとなるワニを探すのを手伝って
description.koreana: 걱정되는 선장을 도와 시계처럼 째깍거리는 악어를 찾으세요
description.portuguese: Ajude o capitão preocupado na busca pelo crocodilo que faz tique-taque
description.russian: Помогите обеспокоенному капитану в поиске тикающего крокодила
description.schinese: 帮助忧心的船长寻找滴答作响的鳄鱼
description.spanish: Ayuda al capitán preocupado en la búsqueda del cocodrilo que hace tic-tac
description.tchinese: 協助擔心的船長尋找滴答作響的鱷魚

displayName.japanese: リニレアフライドチキン

description.english: Kill all chickens in Corsairs Brotherhood.
description.french: Tuez tous les poulets dans Fraternité des Corsaires
description.german: Töte alle Hühner in Bruderschaft der Korsaren
description.japanese: コルセアーズブラザーフッドで全ての鶏を殺す
description.portuguese: Mate todas as galinhas na Irmandade dos Corsários
description.russian: Убейте всех кур в Братстве Корсаров
description.schinese: 在海盗兄弟会杀死所有的鸡
description.spanish: Mata a todos los pollos en Hermandad de Corsarios
description.tchinese: 在海盜兄弟會殺死所有的雞

displayName.german: Schau hinter dich! Es ist ein-
displayName.portuguese: Olhe atrás de você! É um-

description.french: Trouve le singe à trois têtes
description.japanese: 三つ頭の猿を見つける
description.portuguese: Encontre o macaco de três cabeças
description.spanish: Encuentra al mono de tres cabezas

description.english: Feed Bruce the white shark with the clueless swimmer.
description.french: Nourrissez Bruce, le requin blanc, avec le nageur insouciant
description.german: Füttere Bruce, den Weißen Hai, mit dem ahnungslosen Schwimmer
description.japanese: うろつく泳ぎ手で白いサメのブルースを養う
description.koreana: 무심코 헤엄치는 수영객으로 백상아리 브루스를 먹여라
description.portuguese: Alimente Bruce, o tubarão branco, com o nadador desatento
description.russian: Кормите Брюса, белую акулу, ничего не подозревающим пловцом
description.schinese: 用那个毫无防备的游泳者喂养白鲨布鲁斯
description.spanish: Alimenta a Bruce, el tiburón blanco, con el nadador despistado
description.tchinese: 用那個毫無防備的游泳者餵養白鯊布魯斯

description.french: Trouvez tous les coffres au trésor cachés
description.japanese: すべての隠された宝箱を見つける
description.portuguese: Encontre todos os baús de tesouro escondidos
description.russian: Найдите все скрытые сундуки с сокровищами
description.spanish: Encuentra todos los cofres del tesoro escondidos

description.english: Defeat the pirate kings and become the ruler of the sea.
description.french: Vaincs les rois pirates et deviens le maître des mers
description.german: Besiege die Piratenkönige und werde Herrscher der Meere
description.japanese: 海賊の王を倒して海の支配者になれ
description.koreana: 해적 왕들을 물리치고 바다의 지배자가 되어라
description.portuguese: Derrote os reis piratas e torne-se o governante dos mares
description.russian: Победи пиратских королей и стань правителем моря
description.schinese: 击败海盗王，成为海洋的统治者
description.spanish: Derrota a los reyes piratas y conviértete en el gobernante del mar
description.tchinese: 擊敗海盜王，成為海洋的統治者
